ED_Title: Notification by the Secretary-General under Article 12, paragraph 2, of the Charter  of the United Nations
ED_DecisionText: At its 78th plenary meeting, on 11 June 2021, the General Assembly took note of the note by the Secretary-General (A/75/300).
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
